verbs.description: [V: replacing] [ARG1: columbus day] [ARG2: with indigenous peoples day] is a long overdue victory for civil rights this week the los angeles city council voted 14 - 1 to rename columbus day indigenous peoples day which is part of the country convulsive attempt to right the racist wrongs of the past
